item.title: Simulate RNAseq with Polyester
item.description: Since the simulation is quite slow in generating the data, we have used a modified package available on github, which benefits of the multi-threading functions available in the package doMC. In order to install this package one should overwrite the installation with the github code: devtools::install_github("kcha/polyester") Then all libraries can be loaded library(tidyverse) library(reshape2) library(doMC) library(polyester) library(Biostrings) First we read in the cDNA/transcripts file using the Biostrings package fastaFile = "/usr/share/sequencing/references/rnaseq/Homo_sapiens/ENSEMBL/Homo_sapiens.

item.title: Clone Our Repository
item.description: In order to clone our repository, open a terminal and type git clone https://github.com/nibsbioinformatics/core.git This will create a new folder called core which contains all our code. Refere to the specific pages for instructions on how to implement the different elements of our pipeline.
